{|{{Infobox ship begin}} {{Infobox ship image |Ship image= |Ship caption= }} {{Infobox ship career |Hide header= |Ship country= |Ship flag={{shipboxflag|Soviet Union|naval}} {{shipboxflag|Russia|naval}} |Ship name=K-276 ''Crab'' |Ship ordered= |Ship awarded= |Ship builder= [[Nizhny Novgorod|Gorky]], later towed to [[Severodvinsk]] for completion |Ship original cost= |Ship yard number= |Ship way number= |Ship laid down= |Ship launched= July 1986 |Ship sponsor= |Ship christened= |Ship completed= |Ship acquired= |Ship commissioned= September 1987 |Ship recommissioned= |Ship decommissioned= |Ship in service= |Ship out of service= |Ship renamed=B-276 ''Kostroma'' |Ship reclassified= |Ship refit= |Ship struck= |Ship reinstated= |Ship homeport= |Ship identification= |Ship motto= |Ship nickname= |Ship honors= |Ship captured= |Ship fate= |Ship status={{Ship in active service}} |Ship notes= |Ship badge= }} {{Infobox ship characteristics |Hide header= |Header caption= |Ship class={{sclass|Sierra|submarine}} |Ship type= |Ship displacement=*<!-- 7,200 tons (surfaced) *8,100 tons (submerged) --> |Ship length= {{convert|107|m|ft|abbr=on}} |Ship beam= {{convert|12.2|m|ft|abbr=on}} |Ship height= |Ship draft={{convert|8.8|m|ft|abbr=on}} |Ship depth= |Ship decks= |Ship deck clearance= |Ship power=Atomic |Ship propulsion=*1 × [[Pressurized water reactor|OK-650A reactor]], 180 MW *also auxiliary power sources |Ship speed=*{{convert|19|kn}} (surfaced) *{{convert|35|kn}} (submerged) |Ship range=Unlimited, except by food supplies |Ship endurance= |Ship test depth= |Ship complement=59 (31 officers, 28 warrant officers) |Ship time to activate= |Ship sensors= |Ship EW= |Ship armament=*2 × {{convert|650|mm|in|abbr=on}} torpedo tubes *4 × {{convert|533|mm|in|abbr=on}} torpedo tubes *SA-14 Gremlin/SA-16 Gimlet missiles
|Ship notes= }} |} '''B-276 Kostroma''' is a Russian [[Sierra class submarine]]. She was launched in 1986, commissioned in 1987, and named '''K-276 Crab''' until 1992. The Kostroma was built at [[Nizhny Novgorod|Gorky]] and later towed to [[Severodvinsk]] for completion. She is part of the [[Russian Northern Fleet]].
On February 11, 1992, the Kostroma - then still named ''K-276 Crab'' - [[Submarine incident off Kildin island|collided with the ''USS Baton Rouge'']] (some sources state it was ''[[K-239 Carp]]'' that collided with the ''[[USS Baton Rouge (SSN-689)|Baton Rouge]]''). The ''Baton Rouge'' was damaged (as was the ''Crab''/''Kostroma'') and was eventually deactivated in 1993. The crew of the K-276 painted the number "1" bordered by a star on the [[Sail (submarine)|sail]], as did Soviet submarines during World War II to indicate the number of their victories.
==References== * Robert Hutchinson, ''Submarines, War Beneath The Waves, From 1776 To The Present Day'' * [http://www.donbass.dn.ua/showtext.php?mat=6601&rubr=15 ''In two steps to catastrophe'': article about the collision of K-276 and ''Baton Rouge''] {{ru icon}} * [http://www.deepstorm.ru/DeepStorm.files/45-92/nts/945/K-276/K-276.htm Timeline of the B-276/K-276] {{ru icon}}
